question: Gán-cháⁿ ê chit-ê su-liàu mn̄g-hiáⁿ ū siáⁿ-chē ê chú-iàu chîn-m̄-lāi chha-sòan siōng chē?
answer: What were the return on average assets and ROWC of Halliburton co. and other companies in the energy sector from Apr 2016 to Jul 2017 compared to their Gross Profit Margin and CROAFA?

question: Kènn-tōe saⁿ ê siau-mn̄g, lóng-chóng ū chek-tōa-chē 'liân-kiat chu-liāu' (Related Metrics)?
Tī teh hō͘ chi̍t kî-thong kap i ê tùi-chhiú pí-kàu ê chiâⁿ-sû, tòe hiah ê "Structured Data Request" tang-lāi siâⁿ siá ê siâⁿ-khó ê ji̍t-kî sī siáⁿ-chē?
Heng-hô siâⁿ-oân ê chū-jiân gí-giân tiau-sû tòe tio̍h siâⁿ-oân kó͘-sêng ê sî-kan tn̂g-té ê？
answer: What were the return on average assets and ROWC of Halliburton co. and other companies in the energy sector from Apr 2016 to Jul 2017 compared to their Gross Profit Margin and CROAFA?

question: Tui à-i ê su-biāu tang-tiong, à-túi ū chhiūⁿ "plc" he̍h "Co." chek ê kok-lí piāu-chì-hō ê kong-si ê su-kiû lāi-bīn, ū chū-tè kî-pún ê metric-á sī siáⁿ-mih?
answer: Cash Return on Average Fixed Assets

question: Tī Amcor plc ê chit-ê chit-ê su-kiû tang-lāi, chāi 'Structured Data Request' lāi-bīn liệt-chhut ê só͘-ū chha-tōa-sè lāi-bīn, ū kúi-hē-chē hē-sò͘ (metrics) bêng-bêng-á ū 'Cash' chit ê sû?

Jīa-su̍t Adobe ê oē-gân sṳ̂n-su̍t hō͘-chhoán lâi ka-ji̍p "Sṳ̂n-chiap Oân-choân-tōa-liōng" ê sṳ̂n-khó͘, chū Halliburton sṳ̂n-khó͘ chòe thiāu-chún, `Structured Data Request` lāi ê tōa-liōng lia̍t-toa̍h cháiⁿ ē iâⁿ hō͘ chha̍h-tōaⁿ?
answer: Tī `Structured Data Request` ê tōa-liōng lūi-hāng, ē hō͘-chhoán lâi ka-ji̍p "Sṳ̂n-chiap Oân-choân-tōa-liōng" kap Halliburton sṳ̂n-khó͘ lāi ê i ê sṳ̂n-khó͘ sṳ̂n-chiap. Chit-ê ì-bī sī lâi ka-ji̍p 'Sṳ̂n-chiap Oân-choân-tōa-liōng; net income; Working capital' tòe goân-lâi ê lia̍t-toa̍h, tùi-chú ê liat-toa̍h sī: (Sales Revenue; Total Revenue; Economic Value Added; Net operating profit after tax (NOPAT); Cost of capital; Return on Working Capital; Net income; Working capital).

question: Tùi chit-ê chu-liāu lâi kóng, chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t-ê chū-rán-gí 'Query' ê kám-bîm hām 'Structured Data Request' lāi-bīn sò͘-liōng ê metics ū sím-cháiⁿ koan-hē?
answer: Ū chi̍t-ê chha-jīm-tek ê koan-liân-hē. Ū nn̄g ê koh khah kám-bîm ê Query (Amcor kap Halliburton ê) tò-sǹg tī i ê structured request lāi-bīn ū khah chē ê metrics (hun-pia̍t sī 14 kap 12), pí Adobe ê kán-tan ê Query khah chē, Adobe ê chi̍t-chéng 5 ê metrics chiō-kàu. Chit-ê siau-bē chòe chhin-chhiūⁿ sī, tong lâng ê mn̄g-tē ê hun-sek chhim-tō͘ cheng-ka ê sî, su-iàu ê chu-liāu yaw mā cheng-ka.

question: Im-mi̍h lōe-iông ūi-tiāⁿ lâⁿ-lâng ê siau-mn̄g thiah-chòe chi̍t-ê sió-tiāⁿ-chū-hôe ê hêng-sek, bêng-liâm liè chhut kong-si, chú-iàu ê chu-liāu, koan-liân ê chu-liāu kap su-iàu ê sî-kan tōaⁿ?

Tui 'Required Data' kah 'Structured Data Request' chit kóa bûn-chúi ê sî-kan chu-liāu lâi khuànn, ū sî-kan-khuài ū liân-kiat lâi chhoán-chha bô? Nā-sī ū, chhiáⁿ chhoē chhut lâi ê chu-liāu, koh kā chhò-chāi ê sū kái-soeh chi̍t-ē.
answer: Ū, Amcor plc ê chu-liāu ū chi̍t ê chin tōa ê chhò-chāi. 'Required Data' bûn-chúi sī kóng 'chìn-chêng 6 kó͘ goe̍h', tān-sī tò-tùi ê 'Structured Data Request' sī 7 kang ê sî-kan '(7/1/2024 - 7/7/2024)'. Kî-thaⁿ nn̄g ê chu-liāu chit nn̄g ê bûn-chúi ê sî-kan-khuài sī tò-tòan--ê.

question: Tī chit ê su-liāu lāi-bīn ū kuí ê bô-kāng ê kong-si ê miâ?
